name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Jerome PASSARELLI, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Jerome PASSARELLI, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of December, 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, limited to he following issue:
Whether evidence of the previous physical abuse of a child is admissible against a defendant when there is no proof linking the defendant to the prior act.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
812 A.2d 1225
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Jerome PASSARELLI, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 24, 2002.
